Author: mal31_
Text: “I don’t support that but I love you!” works WONDERS. my friend uses it for me and it helps me be able to tell her things and struggles without her being like and ana buddy. It’s huge for me to talk about ed struggles and it helps our relationship especially when I’m restricting
